mapper.sql: uq.unqualify_apply_id as unqualifyApplyId,uq.product_id as productId,uq.unqualify_item as unqualifyItem,uq.unqualify_count as unqualifyCount, uq.assembly_date as assemblyDate,uq.emp_id as empId,uq.apply_date as applyDate,uq.note as note,e.emp_name as empName,p.product_name as productName
mapper.select:
select
from unqualify_apply as uq left join employee as e on uq.emp_id=e.emp_id left join product as p on uq.product_id=p.product_id
mapper.update: update unqualify_apply set product_id =#{productId},unqualify_item =#{unqualifyItem}, unqualify_count =#{unqualifyCount},assembly_date=#{assemblyDate},emp_id =#{empId},apply_date=#{applyDate},note=#{note} where unqualify_apply_id= #{unqualifyApplyId}
update unqualify_apply set note=#{note} where unqualify_apply_id= #{id}
